title: looking for team to join for casual ranked play
body: looking for team to join to become a better player in ranked with a familiar team or ppl, instead of randoms. i want to progress my rank with decent players and learn new stuff and have a  good time. iam not a agro player and will be respectful and a honest player. i never rage quit because i didn't get my way because no one is perfect. looking for decent ppl to play ranked casually because yes i do have a life and  cant play all the time which sucks so just casual for now. i don't really have a main i am a fill type of person to do whatever but if i have a strong end it would be support or jg. so if you want add me go for it . chrispyxxx currently silver

replies.body: Hey I need people to play with! I am in bronze but just became ranked. if you want to play please message back :)
